title: Dil Kya Kare Jab Kisi Se Pyaar Ho Jaye

lines.lyrics: Dil kya kare jab kisi se
lines.indian: Ga Dha Ni Sa Ni Dha Ni Re
Dha SaDha SaDha SaReSa Dha _ Dha
Ga Dha Ni Sa, _NiDha Ni GaRe Re
Dha SaDha SaDha SaReSa Dha _ Dha
Ga' Re' Ga' Ga'Re'Ga' Ga Re Re ReSaNi

lines.lyrics: Na kuch tere, bas main julie
lines.indian: Ga _GaRe Ga GaReGa, _ Ga Re Re ReSaNi
Ni niRe ReSaReGa _ReSa SaSa Sa _ Ni Dha
GaGa _GaDha Dha PaGa, Ga _GaDha Dha Pa

lines.lyrics: Aise kisi chehre pe, nigaahrukti hai
lines.indian: Sa NiSaNi SaNi SaSa, Ni DhaPa DhaPa __ Ga _ReSa

lines.lyrics: Ho rok nahin sakti nazron ko
lines.indian: Ga Ga Re Ga GaReGa Ga Re Re ReSaNi
Ni niRe ReSaReGa _ReSa SaSa Sa _ Ni Dha
